name: Linearkey - As Things Stand
author: KesieV
description:
Twenty! Milestone reached!

Well. I thought that the 20th game should be something bigger that uses most of the Wright! engine without adding any new feature. And this 20th game happened when I was playing both Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number (2015) on Playstation Vita and Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag (2013) on Nintendo WiiU. These games series, together with Dishonored (2012), launched the interesting sub-genre I call 'arcade stealth'.

While the Metal Gear (1987) series and the Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell (2002) series are more tactical, this new breed of stealth games add standard arcade games gameplay to the mix, requiring critical thinking before shooting furiously. One of the best mixes since RPG-with-anything. I decided to make a little tribute to Hotline Miami and the Assassin's Creed series with a cross-demake but, like RPGs, tactical games are often story-driven and I needed a strong one.

After talking with my girlfriend Bianca, I was allowed to make an official sequel of her free experimental sci-fi book, Linearkey (2006-2011, http://www.linearkey.net - italian only) with a good degree of freedom. So, 'Linearkey - As Things Stand' was born!

Plot!

2131. There isn't anything alive on earth by years and, as a survivor, you and your fellow citizend passed your whole life under a self-sufficient dome. But someone managed to escape from the dome and discovered that the government lied: there is something out there. Why they lied? What's outside the dome? Discover the truth by yourself, hiding from enemies or killing them brutally! Use UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT for moving your character. Use the A BUTTON for stuning enemies. Press A BUTTON near stunned enemies to jump over and hit them. Use the B BUTTON for running. While running, you can jump obstacles and go down buildings going over its edges. But don't forget: read the original book, which is damn good.

set.html: What do you want, little piece of trash? Huh?
Why you're shitting on Upcity with your fetid presence? Are you upset?
Are you upset because of this dome? You don't like the food? The weather?
Are you upset because I'm keeping you trash citizens safe?
Safe from the killers of outside?
Because outside is full of friends of yours, idiot. Go out playing with them!
Honestly, fuck you whatever your shitty name is. You are ungrateful.
You and your stupid revolutionary friends. Shitheads.
Go crash everything. Kill everyone. Then try to find a damn solution.
...And you'll be the next fucking governor to be killed!
Do it, piece of shit! DO IT, PSYCHOPATH!
Guards? But why?
"Incoming call. Answering..."
I bet that WhiteIron is full of guards now.
Y... yes...
Look for your boss and don't get killed, okay?
Okay. I must find him and ask him a question.
I'll... not hit anyone this time.
Good luck.
This is the production dock. Okay.
The chief should be around the offices.
Better have a look from the top of the building before going there.
It's him. Just in front of his office.
Now I must move containers nearby the production dock.
Let's go there now.
Lorenz! What are you doing here?!
Chief. I'm here just for asking if...
Asking? ASKING?! You are not paid for asking!
Go back to your work! We need more robot cops!
Robot... cops?
Are you still asking? You're just dirt, like...
...your little violent rebel friends from Downcity!
I'm not violent and they aren't my friends, chief! I swear!
SHUT UP! HT Palace nerds asked us to make these damn robots...
...and WE do THAT damn robots, okay?
And YOU are still a fucking dirty killer!
Poor little boy. You are going to...
KILL ME! AH AH AH AH!
"Incoming call. Answering..."
Lorenz! What happened there?!
I don't know, Key! I can't understand...
He talked about orders from the HT Palace...
HT Palace? Huh... You have to talk with Fabre, then...
He's one of the big bosses there. Virgo named him few times.
Wh... what happened...
Lorenz! Are you there?
Y... yes. I'm heading to the HT Palace.
I'll meet this Fabre.

set.instruction: Meet Fabre at the HT Palace

set.html: I must reach the Level Up pub without being noticed...
...Or my life is screwed. Well... let's do it.
Are you still thinking that you're a...
...FUCKING HERO NOW?
SOMEONE... HELP... PLEASE!!
Thanks to you and your fucking friends...
...now Upcity is shutting down our little business here...
...because they think that we're going to...
...start a "great and violent revolution".
I... didn't...
Let's send a friendly message to the cops and...
...gift them with the dead body of...
...one of the "revolution leader".
It's a good move, don't you think Key?
What... what's happening here?
PLEASE HELP ME!
STOP THIS PSYCHOPATH!
Oh, god! You killed him!
I'm... not... a murderer... I...
Eh eh eh--- Don't worry, pal!
He was our usual Downcity mobster. Who are you?
I killed...
Hellooo?
I... I'm Lorenz. I work at WhiteIron and...
God. What I've done.
Oh. You're probably here for Virgo, right?
I've a bad news...
...and another bad news.
The first one is that Virgo already left this dome...
...and I really can't guess where is he now.
I'm late... Shit.
The second one is that your bandana is quite useless now...
They've placed cameras everywhere during last night...
...and that's why that guy was in bad mood today.
So... they already...
Right. Your future at WhiteIron is gone.
But... rejoice my friend!
WhiteIron started building robot cops and...
Look. Stop making fun of me.
But it's true. Probably you helped too.
Stop spitting shit, Key.
Listen: why don't you go asking that...
...to your boss at WhiteIron?
We can keep chatting using our Mate-X.
I'll help you from here and I'm so curious...
...to see your face when you'll discover it too.
For sure, jokester. Then I'll come here for you.
Se you later, then.
Anf... Anf...
I... need... some rest...
Chief should be at WhiteIron as usual.
I've just to go there and talk with him. It...
...will be surely easier than fighting mobsters.
I have just to keep calm.
"Incoming call. Answering..."
Hello there! Fabre should be somewhere nearby.
Just have a look around and talk with him.
I'll talk with him.
Key. Why they are keeping us into this dome?
Why they are threating us like animals?
Heh.
I bet that Fabre will give you all these answers.
I want to know his answer too. This time...
...don't hang up this call. I want to hear his own words.
Okay. I'm going there.
Good luck!
I'm leaving this place too. Let me go.
Good. But you have to answer my questions first.
Why we're living under this dome? Questions like this one?
Honestly, I don't have any of these answers too...
...despite I knew everything from the beginning.
Because I fear everything and...
I'm paying for this everyday.
That's why you have to let me go away.
It's too easy to end this jumping from this roof.
It's too easy to end this with my death.
I must do something like you're doing now. My way.
Vladimir Ludov. He knows how to talk with the governor.
And I'm pretty sure that the governor will give you...
...a valid explanation for everything.
I... I must go elsewhere.
I... I'm not sure I can let you go.
You're part of this. I... we can't forgive you.
Lorenz! Let him go!
Tsk.
Hi, Key.
I... don't... know...
Lorenz!
What... what did you do?!
You've killed him?
...I... I don't know.
Okay. It's okay, Lorenz. Now we've to find this Ludov.
...And this is a big problem.
He's probably someone nearby the governor.
We won't be able to meet him directly in any way. So...
...we've to look around for some clues and rely on luck.
Okay. I'll have a look to the Restaurant Zone.
VIPs usually go there for their meetings and...
...after what happened during this Celebration Day...
...I'm sure I'll find someone important there.
Good guess! Have a look there!
Good luck!
That well dressed guy... It's probably him.
But... what's doing on this roof?
Mate-X, call Vladimir Ludov.
"Vladimir Ludov is not available... Leave a message."
Anna Hawk's speaking.
Mister Ludov, we've to keep calm.
I've already sent projects for robot guards to WhiteIron...
...and I'll personally make sure that Fabre won't be able...
...to make any mistake for the third time.
"Incoming call. Answering..."
Mate-X, hang up.
"Hanging up."
I must meet this Ludov at the Plaza.
"Incoming call. Answering..."
Well, Lorenz. What's happening in the Restaurant Zone?
A woman called Anna Hawk is leaving a message to Ludov.
You're a frigging lucky guy, you know?
Anyway. You have to follow her and...
...hear the whole phone call and not get caught.
I know.
Key, please. I don't need your help.
I'm able to handle everything in my way.
The same words of Fabre, huh?
Okay, I'll leave this to you.
But just one thing.
Try to remain conscious. I'm a little worried.
Hear you later. Bye.
"Vladimir Ludov is now available. Answering..."
Very well!
Mate-X, delay answer.
The restaurant was on the left... Huh.
Shit. She's moving...
Excuse me, guard.
Yes, madam.
Where is the Finest Food Restaurant?
You have to go back, then turn...
Are you saying I'm on the wrong way?
How inefficient! That's not me.
Thank you, guard.
It's my duty, madam.
Damn! She's coming this way!
That should be the right way. Mate-X, call Vladimir Ludov.
"Calling Vladimir Ludov. Answering..."
Good morning, Vladimir. Have you heard my message?
Okay. We will meet later. What about...
She's moving again! Just a little bit more...
Dammit! Why she's running now?
Ok. We'll meet there later. Bye.
Shit! I've lost the part with the place!
I must ask her directly.
Where are you going to meet Ludov?
WHO ARE YOU? WHY YOU'RE HERE?!
Please. You've just to tell me the place.
GUARDS! GUARDS! HELP! THERE'S A STALKER!
The... name... of... the place.
THIS MANIAC IS SLOWING DOWN MY WORK! HELP!
GO AWAY, FREAK! I'LL BE LATE FOR MY MEETING AT THE PLAZA!
Mate-X, Call Key.
"Placing call. Answering..."
Hello my psycopath friend! How's going?
I must reach Ludov in the plaza center.
I've seen some locks on the sides.
That's really bad, pal.
Okay okay. Can you have a look to the plaza map?
It should be on the south side.
Okay...
But.
I'll help you only if you tell me why you're looking for Virgo...
And why you're going around Upcity killing people.
Later. To the map, first!
Mate-X, send photo to Key.
"Photo sent."
Well. Well. There are three controls on the west side...
...and two on the east side.
You have to hit them in a specific order.
I'll tell you the next one to hit step by step.
Okay. Thank you.
The first one is on the west side. Hit that.
And try to not get caught...
Opening mantainance locks isn't much legal.
The next one is on the north-west.
Okay.
You have to pass thru the east gate.
Go back to the east side for the next switch.
Okay.
And use this time for thinking a good answer for me.
Keep going to the west side. There is another switch.
The last one should be on the east side.
Thank you for your help, Key.
And farewell.
I'm fighting who caged us into this dome because...
...because no other one is fighting for it.
Nobody is asking anything to them.
Nobody is giving us any answer.
Why? Why nobody is reacting in front of this farce?
Sigh.
And about Virgo...
I'm not sure why I feel the need to talk with him again.
But I must do it. I must leave him a message.
I mostly disagree. But I understand what you're feeling.
Good luck, Lorenz.
"Call ended."
Let's go.
Time to get my VIP pass to the Governor.
Wh... what do you want?
Mo... money? I've plenty of money and...
I... I can clean up your name...
D... Do you want answers?
I've plenty of them! In a file, in my office!
I can... give you a copy...
ANY! ANY NUMBER OF COPIES!
No.
So what do you want? Please, let me live!
I just want you to die. Now.
But why?! This... isn't a good affair!
I can give you any explanation...
Tell... you names... Very important names and...
...and a position! At the Government palace!
A position?
YES! Yes... I can give you a pass right now...
Go there and tell at the reception that I've...
...read you resumee and... It's... okay.
I'll go there. Farewell.
Let's pay a visit to our dear governor.
I'm pretty sure I'll have an interesting chat.
Oh, shit...
I must open the offices door but...
...but's it's full of guards here...
I... I... am... so... fucked...
I'll get there my way. You'll see it.
Impossible...
I... did... it.
I did it.
AH AH AH AH AH! I'M INVINCIBLE!
AND I'M... GOING TO... KILL...
KILL EVERYBODY, FUCKERS!
What... what the fuck happened?!
How I... managed to...
Shit! I've killed the governor for real!
Oh, god...
I must leave this place now!
Oh, god.
I've killed the governor... I've...
I've finally left the message I wanted to leave.
Virgo... I've fought our oppressor with my hands.
This is the way. That's the right way...
...to start a revolution. Words... and music are...
...Are not enough. Are never enough.
COME OUT WITH YOUR HANDS UP!
Shit! I'm done!
COME OUT... NOW!
Time to end this.
Farewell Key. Farewell Virgo. Thank you.
"Incoming image from #@#!!@"
The map of the archive infrastructure...
So...
I must open the east wing from the west wing switch.
Looks pretty easy. I've just to hide myself...
...and don't kill anyone.
Heh.
I'm a pro spy. No doubt.
Well. Now, to the east wing.
Maintenance stairs are now usable.
Let's go to the roof and open the maintenance gates.
"Antenna found. Uploading data..."
That's so easy? Well, security has been ignored here.
It's funny that Lin used to work at the HT Place.
"Upload completed. Good job, Key."
...Nice touch, Lin.
Let's leave this place as soon as possible.
Whew! That was exciting!
It's surprising that Lorenz did this many times.
I need some relax, now.
I think I owe to myself some good music.
Time to go to the Music Area.
There should be the the latest Jodie Smash concert.
Looks like the antenna access is still closed.
I must look around for one more switch.
Bingo. Let's go!
There are a lot of people today.
Very well! GO JODIE!
Charlie ready for the last hit, boss!
"Finish her."
My pleasure, boss!
Wha...
Citizens! Leave this place immediately!
Let's go checking the roof!
Hi, Key.
Lorenz?!
It looks like the Upcity killer is still around...
...don't you think?
You've messed up this concert, right?
For leaving a message to Virgo.
No.
I'm now sure that I was totally wrong...
...and you were right.
Violence didn't get me anywhere. I've spoken to people instead.
I've explained them how big the Upcity problem is...
...and then they moved by themself.
What happened during the celebration day was shocking...
But most of the people still need clear explanations instead...
And, sadly, still need leaders for guiding them before acting.
Heh.
It looks like I was wrong too.
When you were executing our executioners I wasn't doing anything.
But it looks like that our Virgo had the right idea, once more.
Just have a look to the archives today...
You'll find an interesting book about the adventures...
...of our hacker friend Lin, Virgo as AR and me.
The "Linearkey Project".
Heh.
Lin. AR. Key. Clever.
I bet that comes from Virgo.
Modestly that was an idea of mine.
Heh.
Well. The concert have been suspended - and this sucks.
I think I'll go back home and try composing some music...
...like the Symphony No. 9 of Beethoven.
But... what about you? Are you going to leave the dome?
Well...
Agent Alpha is ready. Waiting for orders.
"Very well. Our target is just arrived."
"Proceed with the sabotage."
Roger. I'm going.
What's happening to Jodie?
She's... glitching!
"This concert is broken, guys."
"But... is she a digital avatar?"
"You didn't know?"
Shit! People is leaving the concert!
What's happening?!
Agent Bravo ready.
"Go."
Roger.
"How annoying. I'm going to the archives."
"I'm coming with you."
There... there is someone moving on the roof!
Who's that?!
So Symphony No. 9 started playing as planned...
My little friends screwed up the city security as they said.
Heh...
Welcome to the Linearkey project...
...people of the dome.
Wh... what's happening?
The city portal service is broadcasting something...
"This sabotage is our attempt to give you..."
"...the world you weren't able to know..."
"...because you have been deprived of the opportunity."
Oh. My. God. That's... not happening for real...
"That's our attempt to give you back the world..."
"...you could not rebuild your way..."
"...because someone stolen you the right"
It's impossible... These words...
Damn Virgo... What have you done?
I knew that Virgo weren't at work today.
Damn.
That's not good. Not good at all.
I must ask few questions to his friend Key at the Pub Zone.
It's nearby the Downcity gates, if they see me going there...
...my career here at WhiteIron is ruined.
I need something to cover my face...
Let's try like this. Well...
...Let's go to meet Key at the Pub Zone.

set.instruction: Meet Key at the Pub Zone

set.html: Heh.
I'm surely going to die.
And I'm not so sure of what I'm doing.
Am I really leaving a message to Virgo?
Will all this be seen by Virgo a day?
It doesn't matter. Let's use this pass...
...and see what happens.
"Breaking news. The governor was found dead..."
"...inside the government palace, following the trail..."
"...of violence since the last celebration day."
"Authorities said that the murderer have been captured."
So that's how Lorenz ended.
Heh.
"Incoming file from #@#!!@"
Huh?
"Hi Key. It's Lin! How's going?"
Lin? He's sending a message from outside the dome?
Little nerd. He screwed up the city security and left...
...a backdoor for communicating. The usual smarty pants.
"We aren't sure that's true but..."
"...it looks like the governor has been murdered few days ago."
"While it's a bad news..."
"AR is quite happy that something is moving there."
Lorenz was right, after all...
"That's why I'm sending you the book AR wrote these days."
"It explains how we managed to escape and why we did it."
A book about our adventures. That's so Virgo.
"Can you go to the archives and upload that?"
WHAT? HOW I'M SUPPOSED...
"You're probably asking yourself how to do it by yourself."
"Just go nearby the antennas. We'll use the same trick..."
"...I've used for hacking the city security."
"Antennas are hard to reach but..."
"If you've killed the governor..."
"...that should be easy for you, right?"
"Good luck!"
"Message ended. Looking for an antenna..."
It looks like there will be some action for me too.
Let's go.

object.html: Based on the book "Linearkey" by Bianca Brenna - http://www.linearkey.net

set.html: So... we are living caged into this dome from ages...
...and there is a world outside as Virgo guessed.
I must find him before it's too late.
As things stand... I'll stick to the plan...
...and no more killings. I must redeem myself.
I failed and I must repair everything.
Heh.
This "Linearkey Project" is smarter than I thought.
Remember. The idea of the name is mine...
...and I'm not going to add any Lorenz in it.
Fair enough!

set.html: Lin. The videogame you've made is pretty...
...pretty inaccurate.
What do you mean, mr. Awesome Plot Virgo?
Upcity is way larger than a 3x3 grid and...
...buildings are not all the same with different colors...
Some portraits are very inaccurate, like the Lorenz one...
...music is obviously missing...
...and I don't think that someone like the governor...
...could use the words you've chosen for him.
...And?
And...
I don't know how do you know some facts...
...that are shown in your videogame.
Lorenz really killed the governor?
And... he managed to kill him...
...in the government palace for real?
That's all?
For now, yes. Your turn, computer guy.
Well. First point: I had very few days...
...for understanding how this damn old computer works...
It's a miracle that I managed to recycle the code I've found...
...and put everything together by myself, so...
I'm a damn awesome genius. Period.
Undoubtedly.
Then, I obviously know that Upcity is larger and better....
...than the Upcity of this tiny game. But...
...that's all I managed to fit in this computer memory.
Second point: I've never seen some of the game characters.
One of them is Lorenz, who I asked you to describe and...
Ehm.
You described him as "someone perfectly normal".
Well, thank you for the precise identikit.
Third point: our musician, Key, is missing.
He decided to stay into the dome and we've to thank him.
But, sadly, if he's there... he can't be here...
...putting together the music for this game.
Third point: is your book accurate?
Heh.
I've put together some messages from Key...
...in order to make the story of the game...
But there was something missing that I had to "guess"...
...as you did in some of the parts of your book.
Touche'.
We've to make stuff interesting...
...in order to reproduce feelings to readers and players.
Without changing the facts too much, obviously. Right?
"Life is the farce we are all forced to endure."
Stuff like that.
Guys!
Yes, madam?
Yes, Mira? Oh god, "madam"...
It seems that this truck is stopping...
So... we've arrived somewhere?
Mira... can you see anything from there?
Uh. I'll have a look again.
Yes...
You...?
I can see...
Oh!
